dtliExcerpt: It was hard to know if it was the play or the cast that prevented me from connecting with the characters on a level beyond smug satire.
bwwExcerpt: James Corden was legit hilarious in One Man, Two Guvnors, but that was 13 years ago, before he became a late-night tryhard and the bane of Balthazar. neil patrick harris still has impeccable sitcom timing. Bobby Cannavale has paid his stage dues for years—whether or not he’s right for the part. Is this cast worth half a grand? Is the play? Reza’s 1998 comedy abounds in witty chuckles and elegant structure, but it remains a slight boulevard comedy: three self-obsessed Frenchmen bickering over a pricey painting.

llmScore.reasoning: Critic expresses fundamental disconnection with the material, unable to distinguish whether the fault lies with the play or performances, suggesting problems with both core elements.
